Title: Relates to admissibility of statements obtained from persons under the age of eighteen by means of deception
Summary: Provides that statements made by minor defendants as a result of deception by law enforcement during custodial interrogation are inadmissible.
LawCode: Amd ยง60.45, CP L; amd ยง344.2, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law and the family court act, in relation to admissibility of statements obtained from persons under eighteen years of age by means of deception
